title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7032.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7032.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the following definitions shall
apply to the terms listed below: (a) Grievance shall mean a written inmate complaint concerning either written or
unwritten facility policies, procedures, rules, practices, programs or the
action or inaction of any person within the facility. Dispositions, surcharges, and sanctions resulting from disciplinary hearings and administrative
segregation housing decisions shall not be the subject of a
grievance. (b) Grievant shall mean
an inmate who has filed a grievance pursuant to this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7032.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
